title: Pantera Capital Predicts ‘Strong’ Crypto Bull Market Over Next 18-24 Months
description: American hedge fund Pantera Capital has predicted “a strong bull market” for cryptocurrencies over the next 18-24 months. “With the halving expected to occur in late April 2024, we believe the convergence of these positive things will provide strong tailwinds for the next bull market,” said Pantera founder Dan Morehead. Pantera’s Bull Market Prediction Pantera […]

title: Unlocking Deep Learning Potential – Experts Revolutionize Perception Tasks
description: In a groundbreaking study titled “Learning by Reconstruction Produces Uninformative Features For Perception,” researchers Randall Balestriero and Yann LeCun have unveiled crucial insights into the challenges plaguing reconstruction-based learning within the realm of deep learning. The duo’s investigation focuses on why reconstruction-based methods often fall short in delivering competitive latent representations essential for perception tasks, […]
